chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 croaked religiously at 10 PM sharp: "Chirpy! Meds time!" Chirpy the chick 🐥 always obliged. One night, lost in a video game 🎮, Chirpy completely forgot! 💥 Next morning, Ferdinand found Chirpy covered in…glitter? ✨ "The 'Forget-Your-Meds-And-Turn-Into-A-Glitter-Bomb' side effect got ya!" Ferdinand chuckled. "Worth it!" Chirpy chirped, shimmering. ✨
